entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY ENDED, Labrador City
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:22 PM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wabush Airport 2:13 PM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -4.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -7.0°C
Wind: ESE 21 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 2:52 PM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 2:52 PM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
